title: Looking for T205 Archer and Evers cards
author: kmac32

posts.post_title: Looking for T205 Archer and Evers cards
posts.post_content:
Hello,

Looking to build a T205 collection and for 2 cards in particular.  T205 James P Archer and T205 John J Evers.  Any back is fine and would prefer minimal paper loss.  If you have these, contact me at [url]cubkmac32@aol.com[/url] and give me details of what you have and what you want for them.

Thanks,

Kmac
